title: Newly Renovated 2 Bedroom Top Floor-Specials!
posting_body: ['DELUXE LIVING IN A NATURAL SETTING', 'The Park in Bellevue earns its name with arboretum-style community surroundings while still connecting you to the convenience and excitement of downtown Bellevue and the greater Seattle metro.', 'With its stunning natural beauty and aesthetically pleasing renovated homes that complement the surrounding landscape, this pet-friendly community is a perfect place to call home.', 'At the end of each day, return home to a one or two bedroom apartment featuring a tiled, wood-burning fireplace and a private patio or balcony overlooking a wooded glen.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 90', 'OR Text', '90', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1158 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Reserved Carport', '- Wood Burning Fireplace', '- Full Sized Washer & Dryer', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Vaulted Ceilings*', '- Large Balcony or Patio', '- Abundant Closet Space', '- Cable Ready', '- Extra Storage', '*In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Game Room', '- Brand New Clubhouse!', '- Woodside Terrace with Fireplace, TV and BBQs', '- NEW Outdoor Swimming Pool', '- Park-like Walking Trails', '- Easy Access to Downtown Bellevue', '- Lush Pacific Northwest Landscaping', '- NEW Fitness Center', '- Online Rent Payments', 'Pet Policy', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'We require a $300 refundable pet deposit, $300 non-refundable pet fee and $35 per month pet rent (Per pet).', 'Breed restrictions on dogs apply.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Park in Bellevue', '1515 Bellevue Way NE, Bellevue, WA, 98004', 'RK9OASjTSy']
